org.bonitasoft.engine.api

Interface PermissionAPI


  • public interface PermissionAPI
    Handle permissions of users
    Author:
    Baptiste Mesta

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkAPICallWithScript(String className, APICallContext apiCallContext, boolean reload)
      Execute a groovy class stored in bonita-home/server/tenants/<tenant id>/conf/security-scripts/ using it's class name

    • Method Detail

      • checkAPICallWithScript

        boolean checkAPICallWithScript(String className,
                             APICallContext apiCallContext,
                             boolean reload)
                               throws ExecutionException,
                                      NotFoundException
        Execute a groovy class stored in bonita-home/server/tenants/<tenant id>/conf/security-scripts/ using it's class name

        The class MUST implements PermissionRule If the script is executed without exceptions it means that the user is authorized to access the resource. The class must be put by hand in the bonita home folder bonita-home/server/tenants/<tenant id>/conf/security-scripts/<scriptName>.groovy You can also add jar containing class implementing PermissionRule and execute them using their class name.

        Parameters:
        className - the name of the class of the rule
        apiCallContext - the context of the api call
        reload - reload class when calling this method, warning if some class were called with reload set to false, they will never be reloadable
        Returns:
        true if the user is permitted to make the api call
        Throws:
        ExecutionException - If there is an exception while executing the script
        NotFoundException
        Since:
        6.4.0
